newsitem.title: BULGARIA: NO DEALS ON BULGARIA BOURSE, RABSI UNCHANGED.
newsitem.headline: NO DEALS ON BULGARIA BOURSE, RABSI UNCHANGED.

text.p: No corporate stocks traded on the Bulgarian Stock Exchange (BSE) and the RABSI (Reuter All Bulgaria Stock Index) was unchanged from Monday's 41.28 points, brokers said.
No repo deals in treasury paper were struck either.
The Sofia-based Sofia Stock Exchange, the country's second largest, suspended daily trading yesterday.
Brokers said that the bourse probably would not resume trading before a planned merger with the BSE is carried out.
